title: 日本ダービーの後に・前向きな言葉

text_block_list.text: The winner is Mihono Bourbon. Amidst the roaring cheers, she declares war on Rice Shower. 'In the Kikuka Sho, you are the formidable foe,' she says—
The audience seats are buzzing with excitement. Meanwhile, Matikanetannhauser—
At the press conference, she showed her frustration while expressing her determination for the next 'Kikuka Sho'.
The positive words she spoke at the conference touched the viewers' hearts. Matikanetannhauser has no intention of losing the next 'Kikuka Sho' either.
